```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(coronavirus)
```

```{r}
d1 <- data.frame(coronavirus)
dUS <- subset(d1,country=="US")
dUSC <- subset(dUS,type=="confirmed")
dUSD <- subset(dUS,type=="death")
dUSR <- subset(dUS,type=="recovered")
dUSC$days <- seq(1:nrow(dUSC)) #days since (and including) January 21 2020
dUSD$days <- seq(1:nrow(dUSD)) #days since (and including) January 21 2020
dUSR$days <- seq(1:nrow(dUSR)) #days since (and including) January 21 2020
plot(dUSC$days,dUSC$cases)
plot(dUSD$days,dUSD$cases)
plot(dUSR$days,dUSR$cases)

```
